duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of Systems Engineering Managers and support Systems Engineers (SE) to drive growth within Major Accounts.
Oversee technical pre-sales operations and achieve revenue generation, individual, team, and organizational quotas.
Interact with customers and partners at a senior level and provide valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, and technical evolutions.
Develop and own outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives that drive pipeline and sales with AVP, RVPs, Systems Engineering Managers (SEMs) and SEs.
Maintain strong relationships with Palo Alto Networks’ partners and drive initiatives to improve sales productivity through partner leverage.
Lead portfolio expansion initiatives, upselling subscriptions and strategic solutions.
Ensure metric-based results across all areas of focus and make visible the successes and deficiencies of the initiatives within the area.
Provide account support through SE assignments, load balancing, continuity, and strategic planning with Sales management, Sales Reps, and SEs.
Operate effectively in a matrix manner with extended teams, such as Support, Finance, WW SE, HR, Product Management, and other relevant organizations.
Act as an escalation point for pre-sales and post-sales technical issues that arise in the territory.
Develop, mentor, manage, and support reporting sales engineers with technical and organizational leadership.
Manage successful evaluations and timely return of evaluation equipment.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line, Systems Engineering management experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred).
